CIPHER.0.cipherString: Freedom was the desire of our people throughout centuries. Freedom enabled our people to be owners of their destiny.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: First I lost my voice, then I lost my figure and then I lost Onassis.
CIPHER.1.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: When you're doing a show like 'The Book of Mormon,' you're completely spent by the time the show is over.
CIPHER.2.question: Solve this aristocrat. The letter H maps to G.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I get offered a lot of the same type of thing... The teenage slasher movies.
CIPHER.3.question: Solve this aristocrat. The first word is I.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
CIPHER.4.question: Solve this patristocrat.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine.
CIPHER.5.question: Solve this patristocrat. The letter Y maps to U.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: The E.U. initially decided to end the isolation of Turkish Cyprus, to balance the accession of Cyprus. But the E.U. has not carried through on its promise.
CIPHER.6.question: Solve this patristocrat. The first word is The.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: El amor es una maravillosa flor, pero es necesario tener el valor de ir a buscarla al borde de un horrible precipicio
CIPHER.7.question: Solve this xenocrypt. The letter maps to O.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Tired of nagging your kids to hurry up, get dressed, drink their milk and brush their teeth? Here's a radical idea: Don't.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,3).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: So full of artless jealousy is guilt, It spills itself in fearing to be spilt.
CIPHER.9.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,13).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: The more credit you give away, the more will come back to you. The more you help others, the more they will want to help you.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters A and V map to G and R.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: I'd like to work with Bjork if I could get in the studio with her. We could probably travel to a different planet, you know what I'm saying?
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Of course, we have known for a long time that a word, like any verbal sign, is a unity of two components.
CIPHER.12.question: Encode this sentence with the Caesar cipher with offset 8.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: Your economic and social development is linked to the kind of regime you have.
CIPHER.13.question: Solve this quote which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: Marriage is too interesting an experiment to be tried only once.
CIPHER.14.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword pricing.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: I think if there's a great depression there might be some hope.
CIPHER.15.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword clock.

CIPHER.16.cipherString: I don't want to be involved in endless media gossip.

CIPHER.17.cipherString: Recession is when a neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours.
CIPHER.17.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 2 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.18.cipherString: The want of a thing is perplexing enough, but the possession of it is intolerable.
CIPHER.18.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.19.cipherString: You see, rock and roll isn't a career or hobby - it's a life force. It's something very essential.
CIPHER.19.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 4 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.20.cipherString: There is one thing alone that stands the brunt of life throughout its course: a quiet conscience.
CIPHER.20.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 2 and 4 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.21.question: Decode this quote which has been encoded using the Morbit cipher. OO,OX,X-,XO,XX matches to 5,3,2,8,4.

CIPHER.22.cipherString: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.

CIPHER.23.cipherString: IT TAKES AS MUCH ENERGY TO WISH AS IT DOES TO PLAN.

CIPHER.24.cipherString: LIFE IS ONE LONG PROCESS OF GETTING TIRED.
